channel.title: CVE Feed for httplib2 -- httplib2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for httplib2 -- httplib2

item.title: CVE-2021-21240|2024-08-03T18:09:14.827Z -- httplib2 -- httplib2
item.description: httplib2 is a comprehensive HTTP client library for Python. In httplib2 before version 0.19.0, a malicious server which responds with long series of "\xa0" characters in the "www-authenticate" header may cause Denial of Service (CPU burn while parsing header) of the httplib2 client accessing said server. This is fixed in version 0.19.0 which contains a new implementation of auth headers parsing using the pyparsing library.
